name: Validator_getClassLoaderTest
description: Unit tests for the getClassLoader method in the Validator class.

test_cases.name: testGetClassLoaderWithSetClassLoader
test_cases.description: Tests the getClassLoader method when a custom ClassLoader is set.

test_cases.name: testGetClassLoaderWithContextClassLoader
test_cases.description: Tests the getClassLoader method when the context ClassLoader is used.

test_cases.name: testGetClassLoaderWithDefaultClassLoader
test_cases.description: Tests the getClassLoader method with the default ClassLoader.

test_cases.name: testGetClassLoaderWithNullContextClassLoader
test_cases.description: Tests the getClassLoader method when the context ClassLoader is set to null.
